validations.message: Please limit the page title to under 50 characters.
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, subscript, and strikethrough marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to asset, inline entry, link to entry, and link to Url nodes are allowed

summary.en-US: We and our 717 technology partners ask you to consent to the use of cookies to store and access personal data on your device. content.value: You know how scrolling through the news lately feels like diving headfirst into a dumpster fire? Constant arguments, bad news on repeat, and you're left feeling... well, drained. Yeah, me too.

But here's the thing: what if we tried something different? Instead of just focusing on all the problems, what if we highlighted the good stuff? The things that actually make you smile and think, "Hey, maybe the world isn't completely falling apart!" That's the idea behind TrugoodBeautiful.

We figure, change doesn't only happen by yelling about what's wrong. It also happens when we shine a light on what's right. Think about it: when you see someone doing something amazing, doesn't it make you want to do something amazing too? It's like a good vibe chain reaction.
So, every day, our AI does the heavy lifting. We analyze the top stories from 20 major news sources, so you don't have to wade through the chaos. We distill it down to two key things:
Stories that'll genuinely lift your spirits. The kind that reminds you there's still a lot of awesome in the world.
Because we're not living in a bubble. We'll still give you the important news, but without all the doom and gloom. We want you to be informed, not overwhelmed.
